DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the correct volume of lissamine green to use when assessing conjunctival staining, and to determine the time course needed to evaluate conjunctival staining after lissamine green has been instilled in the eye.
DOC.brief_title: Defining the Conjunctival Staining Method: Instillation Volume and Time Course to Assess Staining With Lissamine Green
